code:
import CryptoJS from'crypto-js';const secretKey='your_secret_key';// Replace 'your_secret_key' with your actual secret key
export const encrypt=text=>{return CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(text,secretKey).toString();};export const decrypt=ciphertext=>{const bytes=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(ciphertext,secretKey);return bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);};
